requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Client is a single father with 2 school-going children. Family is living in a HDB rental. His daughter is in primary school and requires a laptop for school work. However, her laptop has malfunctioned. Client is unable to replace his laptop due to financial difficulties. Client seeks for kind donation for a laptop. Preferably a normal laptop and not MacBook (Apple) as client doesn't have iPhone phone/account. For further details, please contact their social worker, Ms. Seelvi, at 8699 3152. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

requests.name: Mobile phone
requests.description: Client’s family of 6 with 4 young children, resides in a 3 room HDB flat. The couple is facing some challenges that prevents them from seeking employment and are currently working closely with professionals to stabilize their family’s situation. As such, client is currently reliant on formal systems for financial assistance. With limited resources, client cannot afford a new mobile phone and would like to receive a donated one as it is important for her to be contactable by professionals who are working closely with the family as her current mobile phone has spoilt.

requests.name: Children Clothes
requests.description: Client is living in a rental flat with 6 young children (age 5-11). Client recently threw her children's clothes due to bugs infestation. As such, client is hoping to receive some children's clothing (for both boys and girls).

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Karen Ong

requests.name: Stove
requests.description:
A low-income family of 6, including parents and their four young children, are in urgent need  for essential houshold equipment and furniture as they move into their new HDB rental flat.

Items urgently needed include: stove,  refrigerator, washing machine, and wardrobes.

As a Malay family, they would ideally prefer Halal-certified kitchen equipment. However, due to the urgency of their needs, they are open to receiving non-Halal equipment and are prepared to cleanse these items independently to meet their requirements.

Your generosity can make a tremendous difference in helping this family create a safe and comfortable space to call home. If you have any of the above items in good working condition or are able to contribute towards purchasing them, your support would be greatly appreciated.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Choa Chu Kang
contact.name: Lee Zi Xuan

requests.name: Oven
